numlitem.para: Compressor Temperature Bulb for associated pack is operative,
Pack Coolant (Inlet/Exit doors) system is operative, and

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard adjacent to the associated Pack switch "COMPRESSOR OVHT SWITCH(s) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Deactivate the affected Compressor Discharge Overheat Switch as follows:
Position the associated Bleed Air Control panel (P5) PACK selector OFF.
Gain access to the affected pack through the appropriate Air Conditioning Pack Access Door located on the underside of the aircraft.
Disconnect, cap, and stow the electrical connector from the inoperative Compressor Discharge Overheat Switch installed in the Compressor Discharge Duct. Connector part numbers are:
